name: Crash Survivor - Zombies in coming!
description:
LDJAM Project for the Ludum Dare Game Jam. "Keep it alive"

Creators: 

- Alejandro Dumrauf 

- Guido Tello

 - Gonzalo Beraza 

- Lucas Zamboni 

- Micaela Luz Benitez 

- Guillermina  Manzano

- Gianluca Sabatino

Story: Year 2025, we are one of the best important marine from the squad. We have survived to an Helicopter crash, we dont know where the city is. We only know we need to survive the zombies until the rescue helicopter come to save us. With the WASD to move and the left click to shot, we are going to protect this soldier from the zombies attack. Good luck player!
